fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Match two players at night, their winconditions will change to "Be the last two standing".

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Cannot spawn naturally, unless the host decides to spawn lust.
A notification will be sent into the town saying "The town is in passionate heat. Lust drives everything inside of it!"

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the town's desire take over. (NK Goal)
